reviewText: I got this for my son when he was 5 & Beyblades were all the rage at his school. He watched the series over & over again. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 cuz it sounds kind of like they're always yelling but I think it must be Japanese originally & when translated to English they have to talk fast as we have more words (kind of like Speedracer back in my day).
My Son loves watching these cartoons and this is another good one.  The item was as described and was shipped fast.

The Dark Nebula is still following Ginka. Ginka is the only person who can stop an evil Beyblade.

Boys love this stuff. I truly don't get it but, every kid in my son's class and into middle school, loves this Beyblade stuff.
I love beyblade, soothes is fun
Bought as a gift. Child seemed very happy with it.
Great price and kids love it!
Everything thing looks great! Came in quickly, case was in perfect condition.
My 7 yr old LOVES Beyblade and has been watching volumes 1, 2, and 3 over and over.  Can't beat the price at $6!
love this show got the moves for my kid they all play grate and have a nice pic arte work on cover is nice to
awesome.  I think I enjoy watching this more than my 5 year old.  there are a few "scary" parts but overall sends a decent message about competing well.
My son is nearing completion. He loves this show very much. Seemingly perfect for any eight year old with a budding Beyblade collection.
As my grandson would say, This is a SWEET! He is a huge fan of Beyblade and now he can watch them at home or in the car.
